concepttext: Providing housing and creating value for the inhabitants of Yaound√©, Douala and beyond. Since 2001, we have been carrying out sustainable real estate projects with personalised support, advancing with expertise and transparency as a trusted real estate partner.
promomain: Until 31 December 2025, SCI Hibiscus will cover 2% of the notary and land registry fees for eligible reservations.
promotext: Valid for the first 5 reservations on the properties selected below. Discount applied to the advertised purchase price, excluding parking fees. SCI Hibiscus reserves the right to make changes and sell early.
